Docs.summary: Checks if the current hosting environment name is . This API should not be used in libraries, see remarks for details.
Docs.returns: if the environment name is ; otherwise, .
Docs.remarks: The environment names "Development", "Production" and "Staging" are provided as a utility for application developers. Library authors should avoid coupling specific behavior to these environment names.

Docs.summary: Compares the current hosting environment name against the specified value. Library authors should avoid using this API, see remarks for details.
Docs.returns: if the specified name is the same as the current environment; otherwise, .
Docs.remarks: Environment names are generally specific to an application. Libraries designed for use in many different applications should avoid coupling behavior to specific environment names.
